How to
content:
How to

Global Forest Watch is an interactive online platform that offers a variety of data and tools to help you monitor forests. Whether you're looking for general facts or specialized information about fires, climate, or commodities, we can help you learn how to use GFW to achieve your goals.

How can we help you?

    MOST POPULAR QUESTIONS

    • Does GFW distinguish tree plantations from natural forests?

    • How do I cite Global Forest Watch as a data source?

    • How does GFW define key terms?

    • What kinds of data are available on Global Forest Watch?

    • What updates are coming down the road for GFW?

    • Where do the data come from?

    • Who can use global forest watch?

    • Who is behind global forest watch?
